titles.title: To designate the portion of Interstate Route 57 that is located in Illinois as the "Barack Obama Highway", and for other purposes.
Barack Obama Highway Act
Barack Obama Highway Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Highways and Transit.

bill.summary:
Barack Obama Highway Act
This bill designates the portion of Interstate Route 57 that is located in Illinois as the Barack Obama Highway.
